statements: SELECT * FROM product_inventory;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM product_inventory ORDER BY inventory_level DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, inventory_level FROM product_inventory WHERE inventory_level > 10;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM product_inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%chair%';
SELECT MAX(inventory_level) AS max_inventory FROM product_inventory;
SELECT * FROM product_inventory WHERE inventory_level > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM product_inventory WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT product_id, product_name, specification FROM product_inventory WHERE specification LIKE '%premium%' AND inventory_level < 50
SELECT product_id, inventory_level FROM product_inventory WHERE inventory_level BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY inventory_level ASC
SELECT * FROM product_inventory WHERE inventory_level = (SELECT MIN(inventory_level) FROM product_inventory)
SELECT * FROM product_specifications;
SELECT product_name, specifications FROM product_specifications WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, available_quantity FROM product_specifications JOIN inventory_levels ON product_specifications.product_id = inventory_levels.product_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE available_quantity > 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM product_specifications ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, specifications FROM product_specifications WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM product_specifications WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT product_id, available_quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE reorder_level > 50 ORDER BY available_quantity DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM product_specifications;
SELECT product_id, product_name, specifications FROM product_specifications WHERE specifications LIKE '%size%' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM product_specifications;
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price FROM product_specifications WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT product_name, unit_price, weight FROM product_specifications ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory_levels GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM product_specifications;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM product_specifications ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY last_restock_date;
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price, weight FROM product_specifications WHERE weight < 3 AND category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, quantity, last_restock_date FROM inventory_levels INNER JOIN product_specifications ON inventory_levels.product_id = product_specifications.product_id WHERE quantity < 50;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products WHERE product_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%shirt%';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_description, price FROM products WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT category_name, parent_category_id FROM product_categories ORDER BY category_name;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity > 100;
SELECT ps.schedule_id, p.product_name, ps.quantity, ps.start_date FROM production_schedule ps JOIN products p ON ps.product_id = p.product_id WHERE ps.start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM product_specifications;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_description FROM product_specifications ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, current_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'New York';
SELECT plan_id, plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM production_planning WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM product_specifications WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM production_planning WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location LIKE 'USA%';
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity_produced) AS total_quantity_produced FROM production_history GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity_produced > 100;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, minimum_stock, maximum_stock FROM product_specifications JOIN inventory_levels USING (product_id);
